description: Converts a list of text to a list of files.

input.name: list
input.description: The list of the contents of each file as text.

input.name: encoding
input.description:
The encoding of the text. 
Supported encodings are: `ascii`, `base64`, `binary`, `hex`, `ucs2`, `utf8`, or `latin1` 
If unspecified, defaults to `utf8`.

input.name: names
input.description: A list of filenames in the same order as the contents parameter.

input.name: media type
input.description:
An optional MIME type describing the file content. 
If unspecified, defaults to `text/plain`.

output.name: files
output.description: A list of files with the content from the `list` parameter.
